summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5766 for the improvement of Edgemont Place, from Eastmont Way to West Howe Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 76043 as amended by Ordinance No. 76147, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
